ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Again curse him, how he considered!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: May be then be accursed, how he plotted!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Again, ruin seize him, how did he hatch a scheme?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: What an evil plan he has made!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Again accursed be he, how evilly did he decide!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And once more let him be cursed, how he plotted!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Again, may he be cursed how he plotted;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Again, death seize him, how he determined!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Again (self-)destroyed is he, how he planned! -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Let him be destroyed. How he calculated!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And again perish he! How maliciously he devised!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Again, perish he, how he decided!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yea, Woe to him; How he plotted!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And once more let him be cursed, how he plotted!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Again, death seized him, how was his determining!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Again: may he perish, how he analyzed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:20] Again, perish he, how he decided!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Again (self) destroyed is he) again cursed is he, (how he planned!) his saying about Muhammad (pbuh)
